title: Diamond looking to mentor one or two lower-rated players
body:
UPDATE:
Got a lot of interest and life has decided to make me really busy the last few days but rest assured I have not forgotten this thread and I will get to you all soon.

Hello, OCE. 

I'm interested in helping someone with their game -- understanding how to get better, understanding how to win, and understanding the intricacies of the soloq environment. In order to achieve this I am willing to spectate your games and play normals will you so that I can see you play in real-time and offer criticisms and advice on areas in which you can improve. I will, however, NOT play ranked with you or on your account so please do not ask. I am only looking for someone who has a genuine interest in getting better at the game and fully accepts and understands that they are at the rating they are at because they belong there; I cannot help you if you think your teams hold you back.

**Who am I? What makes me capable of helping people play better?**

Two-time diamond this season with a current rating of diamond 4 and a peak rating of diamond 3. I've played this game since Season 2 when Xerath was released. I main jungle but am capable of playing every role (although mid is my weakest). I have a deep understanding of risk versus reward, objective prioritisation, shot-calling and more which I believe would be a great asset to have as a new or struggling player.

If this seems interesting to you, leave a message here and I'll get in touch with you to decide if you're someone I feel I could help.

replies.body: I often play either ashe{{champion:22}}  or zyra{{champion:143}} and im only level 11. I really love this game and started on christmas day, but there is a lot i do not understand or need to know! Are you willing to help me??
welcome to oce, beware the community here is quiet toxic.

Says the guy trying to bring down everyone at every possible chance in every possible post.

This guy is exactly the kind of guy you want to watch out for.
Thanks :). I have recently gotten a lot of experience but i still need help with some things... are you willing to help me still?
Hey mate, thanks for the interest. I'm primarily looking for level 30s already experienced with ranked who are looking to get better. Good luck on your climb to 30!
Oh sorry to bother you then :)

Hi im a bronze two mid/support player and id really appreicate something like this i understand you dont play mid but i think the help available still applys whatever the lane.  i started when lissandra was released and have been playing kat since :D  {{champion:55}}


And this "iNoob" freak can get off this thread and learn to respect that not everyone spends there whole life sitting in-front of a computer.

It's real :(

*NAWT*
But seriously, don't be an ass.

im interested mythos,


i believe the only thing holding me back from getting to higher rank is not playing enough rank xd

should change next season because in season 4 , i spammed normals to 'practice' for ranked in s4, but when the season rewards were introduced, i was like oh sh.it, better start ranking xd

But this is OCE after all.  (ツ)
Getting more interest than I anticipated. Toying with the idea of adding you all, putting you into a section of my friend's list, and helping you out one by one as I go.

I, I'm sure along with everyone else, would be very grateful. 

I have Vent/Skype/Teamspeak or can get whatever voice program needed to help.

My girlfriend (Space Cowgirl) and I play regularly (At least 2-4 hours a day).

I hope to see you on sometime.
add molendo and sackboy in game. They need it most.
it would be nice to get some advice c:
I'm keen. I've added you...

I'd absolutely love the help :) 
Currently S4 :)

Just a quick question.

What's the biggest difference - that you've noticed - between Platinum (the rank I'm currently in) and Diamond?

> [{quoted}](name=Nives,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RZQdZ40E,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2015-01-04T13:01:02.337+0000)
>
> Just a quick question.
> 
> What's the biggest difference - that you've noticed - between Platinum (the rank I'm currently in) and Diamond?

players in diamond and worse than players in bronze, and players in plat are as crappy as silvers, so to summarize, plat > diamond in terms of actual skill, do yourself a favor and play like bronze if u want diamond, I had a bronze 5 elo boost my account to challenger

I really want to sign up my in game name is mysticnightmare and I main mid and top I usually play random champs in mid and top but my favourite ones are fizz kat akali and talon. I recently picked up yasuo and had 2 quads with him I also had 1 penta with fizz when I was lv 18. I am now lv 30 in silver 5 even though I am not that good

Hey, my Summoner name is Xepher

I have been playing since season 1, have racked up over 1000 SR games and 900 Aram games. 
I have never really tried ranked as i have primarily played for fun, i feel i am at a decent level now and could probably pull myself through to Gold (if i play smart) 

All i would ask is the opportunity to play a few higher ranking summoners on mid lane, to test my skills and see how i match up, before jumping into season 5 and trying ranked. I am currently being matched up with multiple platinum and Diamond players on normals, so my hidden rating would not be that bad, this has also made my time in normals a lot more difficult as the level of my opponents has been raised.
I feel i stand a decent chance, perhaps they are taking it easy in normal games but i am trading with them rather well.

Most of my games are mid lane, a good 400 - 500 of them have been with Leblanc, so she is my most comfortable pick. Although i can play all roles and a big majority of the champions. I own them all and have all T3 runes available for use if that makes any difference. 


Feel free to add me, swing me invites to future games or even just have a friendly 1v1 ..i am just keen to test myself... like world of warcraft, i feel i should hit the proving grounds before queueing for heroics ;)

Regards - Xepher (OCE)

> [{quoted}](name=Xepher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=RZQdZ40E,comment-id=000b,timestamp=2015-01-04T02:38:52.431+0000)

i only play aram like once a month

I'm in Silver 5, and I would really like some help on how to climb faster, I managed to climb from b4 to b1 in like 1 week maybe?
I think it would really help me carry my team mates to victory.

I main mid but I can fill really well. I usually play diana zed or fizz.
when u say fill really well, do you mean you play every role well?

I'd be happy to learn. 

There's always room for improvement.

I was Gold V at the end of season 3 and my season 4 placements went awry with AFK'ers and it ended up placing me back in Silver 5. 

I couldn't believe it.

But it probably had something to do with the fact that I sat safely at Gold instead of continuing.

^^^

theres still lots of room for improvement and more knowledge so yeah i'd appreciate your help , ingame name is milkybarkid1
